name: Namco Museum Battle Collection
summary: Namco Museum Battle Collection brings classic Namco arcade titles to the Sony PSP. Full wireless support lets you challenge up to four of your friends on some of the most classic multiplayer arcade titles. The collection includes more than 20 titles, such as Pac-Man, Ms. Pac-Man, Galaga, Galaxian, Rally-X, New Rally-X, Dig Dug, Rolling Thunder, and Grobda.
